attributes.action: Require universities to fully refund tuition fees for the Autumn term
attributes.additional_details: Because as students who have to take loans and pay back our tution fees, we’ll have to pay an extra year for not being able to learn amidst this pandemic, even though the government might think we do. All students from the North to the south have been effected by covid and our studies have been dramatically effected. We need the Parliament to come to an agreement to help students be able to get in with university and to get jobs to help pay back loans and their taxes. Help the students help you.
attributes.background: Require universities to refund the Autumn semester (Sept - Dec 2020) tution fees for all students including international students. Many will be redoing this semester in summer or re doing the whole year because of a lack of knowledge on online teaching and it’s difficulties, and because of COVID-19
